Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored early in the game.
Jamal Musiala scored a goal and helped set up others.
Toni Kroos orchestrated several key passes and moves.
Kai Havertz scored a penalty after Ryan Porteous was sent off.
Niclas Fullkrug scored a powerful goal in the 68th minute.
Antonio Rudiger accidentally scored an own goal for Scotland.
Pre-Game Insights: Steve Clarke left Billy Gilmour on the bench and brought in Callum McGregor.
Germany played with a 4-2-3-1 formation under Julian Nagelsmann.
Scotland's players seemed overwhelmed by the quality of the German team.
Post-Match Reflections: Nagelsmann praised his team's performance and tactics.
Steve Clarke expressed disappointment with Scotland's showing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The stadium was filled with the global Scottish diaspora.
The pre-game atmosphere was festive and patriotic.
